title: Bffs Cherry Blossom Celebration
description: Step into the vibrant world of BFFs Cherry Blossom Celebration, the ultimate dress-up game where best friends come together to shine under blooming cherry trees! Pick your favorite crew of BFFs and deck them out in stunning spring outfits—think pastel dresses, floral crowns, and cherry blossom vibes.
instructions: Left mouse Button click or tap to play

title: Merge Flowers
description: Merge Flowers is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game! Grow your vibrant garden, discover unique flowers, and earn coins. Enjoy merge puzzle and match-3 mechanics as you combine flowers to create a blooming paradise. With simple controls and cozy visuals, place flowers strategically to make space for new plants. Perfect for puzzle lovers and fans of casual idle games, Merge Flowers offers endless fun and a soothing experience. Start your floral journey today!
instructions: Flowers appear at the bottom of the screen, and your task is to place them wisely on the field based on their color. Match three or more in a row to clear them and earn coins. As you advance, your field expands, and the flowers become even more stunning! Start growing your beautiful garden today!

title: Solitaire Mahjong
description: This is Solitaire Mahjong at its best, offering a classic and elegant mahjong experience without any need to rush. Known as one of the top mahjong games, it features a beautifully traditional layout that fans of mahjong puzzles will love. With polished graphics, a soothing soundtrack, and no timer, Solitaire Mahjong invites you to enjoy each move at a relaxed pace, focusing purely on the pleasure of the game.
instructions: Match identical tiles that have at least one side free and are not covered by other tiles. Each match earns points, adding a touch of strategy to every move. If you’re ever stuck, use the hint function for a helpful nudge. Enjoy a leisurely game without any countdowns—just pure mahjong relaxation.

title: Brawler Man: Fist of Fury
description: Hooligans have taken over the city streets. Join the battle for order in the city! You are a street fighter and want to protect your city from the invasion of hooligans! You will have to visit every corner of the city. Clear the streets of criminals and hooligans with the help of your fighting skills! Deliver cool blows, combine blows to get crazy techniques! In this battle, every blow is important, train to fight back against hooligans and their Bosses.
instructions: PC - Left-click on the strike icon to perform a single strike. To perform a series of strikes and make a combo, hold down the left mouse button and move the cursor through several strike icons. Mobile - Click your finger on the strike icon to perform a single strike. To perform a series of strikes and make a combo, move your finger through several strike icons.

title: GT Formula Championship
description: GT Formula Championship is an exhilarating high-speed racing game that brings the thrill of Formula racing to life. Step into the driver’s seat of the most powerful and technologically advanced Formula cars as you compete against elite racers on world-class tracks. With intense competition, realistic physics, and breathtaking visuals, this game delivers an adrenaline-fueled experience like no other.
instructions: use arrow keys to move

title: Sniper Shot Secret Mission
description: Sniper Shot Secret Mission is a game of nerves and skills. Each time you start the new level, a challenge is waiting for you to solve. Never fire on the wrong target otherwise their no second chance as a sniper. As a sniper you need to work silently once you shoot the bullet everyone will be aware of the situation and you might loose your target. You can be targeted through security guards once you shoot at your high profile targets.
instructions: Sniper Shot Secret Mission gives you experience of hired assassin. Shoot your targets and be the best sniper shooter. Every level gives you different situation, so analyse the situation carefully.

title: Sprunki Easter Coloring
description: Sprunki Easter Coloring is an exciting and colorful online game designed especially for kids who love to explore their imagination. This delightful digital coloring book lets young artists express themselves through a fun and festive Easter theme. With charming Sprunki characters and spring-inspired backgrounds, children can dive into a world of creativity that is both relaxing and full of color. And the best part—it is completely free to play online.
instructions: Mouse to play.

title: Merge Planets
description: Embark on a cosmic adventure! Merge planets in this addictive 2048-style puzzle game and create a dazzling galaxy of your own. With simple drag-and-merge mechanics, stunning visuals, and brain-boosting challenges, it’s the ultimate interstellar journey. Play anytime, anywhere—even offline—and enjoy family-friendly fun that’s easy to learn but hard to master. ? Ready to conquer the galaxy one planet at a time? Download now! ?➡️?
instructions: Use the mouse or tap to move the planets. Click on the playing field to release a planet. When two identical planets touch, they combine to form a larger planet. If the planets don't fit in the box and fall outside the box, the game is over.

title: Word Art – Color Book Puzzle
description: Discover a delightful gaming experience that combines the thrill of solving word puzzles with the joy of bringing art to life. In Word Art – Color Book Puzzle, you’ll embark on a creative journey where words are the key to unlocking vibrant colors and stunning illustrations.
instructions: Drag and drop words to bring black-and-white scenes to life with vibrant colors. Each word reveals stunning visuals, turning puzzles into masterpieces.

title: Hitman Sniper
description: Step into the icy chaos of Tundra Sniper, an adrenaline-fueled first-person shooter where precision and speed are your best weapons. Take on the role of an elite sniper tasked with taking down dangerous criminals and restoring peace to the city.
instructions: Criminals are loose. The city is under threat. You are the last line of defense. Take your position, steady your aim, and eliminate every target. One shot could save the city.

title: Truck Simulator Arcade Championship
description: Truck Simulator Arcade Championship is an exhilarating truck racing game that combines the intensity of high-speed competition with the precision of driving massive, powerful trucks. This game offers an action-packed arcade-style experience where players take control of different types of trucks and compete in various challenging racing events across diverse tracks and terrains.
instructions: WASD/arrow keys to move

title: Bounce Dunk Basketball
description: Love basketball? Want to master the art of bouncing and dunking? In Bounce Dunk - Basketball, you must skillfully control the balls bounce to make perfect shots and get high scores. Tap the screen to control the angle and strength of the basketball so that the ball bounces perfectly into the basket. Or destroy enemies, get coins, etc.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Tony Archer
description: Evil hooligans have caught your friends, free them quickly and punish the villains! You are the great Tony Archer, a dude who masterfully handles all types of weapons, can run fast and is a former military man! In his hands, even a stick becomes a deadly weapon! And Tony Archer knows how to stealthily eliminate enemies. Every villain in this city will be punished and all the main character's friends will be saved! Fight on city rooftops, secret laboratories and enemy military complexes.
instructions: To win, you need to eliminate all enemies and free your friends from the cages. Use objects in the environment to effectively eliminate enemies. To free a hostage, go to his cage and wait for it to open. Controls: PC - use the mouse or WASD keys to move. Shooting - automatic. Mobile - use your finger to move. Shooting - automatic.

title: Mahjong Quest: Candyland Adventures
description: Ready to go on a magical quest through a land made of candy? Jump into Mahjong Quest: Candyland Adventures - where every corner is bursting with sweetness and surprises! The streets are sprinkled with tasty treats, and they’re all yours to match! Find the snacky pairs, clear the board, and munch your way through this delicious adventure. Can you collect all the colorful, candy-coated tiles? Play now and let's find out!
instructions: Tap on 2 identical mahjong tiles to remove them. The tiles must not be blocked on all sides to be used. Clear all the tiles in the playing field before time runs out.

title: Mad Dash
description: Mad Dash is a free puzzle platform game. You are a minotaur trapped in one of the last mazes in the galaxy: a maze of levels. You'll have to jump and dash over treacherous obstacles and challenges to make it through this maze. Many of the platforms are too far apart for you to make it with a simple jump. That is why the mad dash was created. The mad dash happens when players need to jump over spikes or a crevasse that their normal jump wouldn't traverse.
instructions: W,A,S,D or Arrow Pad to move and jump Space Bar to dash.

title: Ocean Rescue
description: A dark power has invaded the ocean, locking sea creatures in water bubbles. Play as Squiddy, a determined and cute squid on a mission to his besties and meet new friends along the way.
instructions: Use the mouse or finger to control the gun

title: Lovie Chic's Coachella Festival
description: Step into the vibrant world of Lovie Chic’s Coachella Festival, the ultimate festival dress-up game! Style your character with trendy outfits, accessories, and makeup to shine at the iconic Coachella Festival. With simple controls and endless creativity, Lovie Chic’s Coachella Festival is perfect for quick fun or long gaming sessions.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Royal Rebellion Punk Magic
description: Two brave girls defy boring traditions and create their own style inspired by punk-rock! Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of anarchy and freedom, where medieval epics are intertwined with daring punk rock. Dress up the girls in leather dresses decorated with spikes and rivets. Create hairstyles that will amaze. Don't forget about makeup: bright lips, bold shadows and provocative piercings. Unleash your imagination by creating images full of energy and rebellion!
instructions: Help girlfriends who are passionate about punk-rock to create a stylish look based on their musical preferences. The most vivid and daring images can be saved at the end of the game as PNG-images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touch screen is used to control it.

title: Ludo World
description: Experience endless fun with various vibrant environments, where every roll of the dice brings a new challenge. Choose between classic or quick mode, progress along the trophy road, and prove you're the master of the board with every move you make.
instructions: In this endless Ludo game, players roll dice to move their tokens from the start to the target square in the center, based on the values rolled. Landing on an opponent’s token can send it back to the start. Players can complete sub-quests for extra rewards.

title: Merge Magnat - IDeaL Store
description: Welcome to the world of trade, where you can create your own shopping district! In this engaging game, you will build the area by placing various shops and attracting customers who will spend money. Merge similar shops to create higher-level versions that yield more profit. Watch as customers pass by your stores, leaving money while you relax and enjoy the game.
instructions: Create and develop your shopping district by placing shops and merging them to level up. Watch as customers spend money, and use the earnings to open new stores and upgrade existing ones. Build your business and become a master of trade!

title: Stickman Archer: Shooting Arrows at Reds
description: Red hooligans have started to take over ancient excavations! Only the Great Archer can stop the villains in red! Stickman the Archer wants to save the world from evil hooligans and now he needs your help! Your goal is to destroy enemy shooters and defeat all the bosses. You are armed with a bow and arrows!
instructions: To win, destroy all enemies on the level. Use the environment to destroy more effectively. Many things in the game are destructible and can help in combat. Controls: PC - use the mouse to control the camera. To aim, hold down the left mouse button. To shoot, release the left mouse button. Mobile - use your finger at the top of the screen to control the camera. To aim, hold your finger on the button with the sight and move your finger. To shoot, release your finger.

title: Chess Online
description: Options: - Choose an opponent from 18 difficulty levels from Beginner to World Champion - Selection of time control modes: Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, Classic - Highlighting possible moves when choosing a piece - Cancel the move, if there was a yawn, you can go back - Interactive hints, showing the best move during the game - Analysis after the game, highlights mistakes and gives recommendations on how to play - Replay the game from the right place - Setting the handicap
instructions: Rules of the game: Situations in which a draw is fixed: - stalemate (if one of the opponents cannot make any move, but there is no checkmate on the board) - three-fold repetition of the position - 50 moves without taking and pawn movement - lack of figures

title: Arrow Wave
description: Explore a world where a wave moves through various obstacles, overcoming challenges along the way. Test your reaction and perseverance!
instructions: MOUSE LEFT-CLICK / UP ARROW - click and hold to ascend. Release to descend.

title: Offroad Jeep Game Simulator
description: Off road legends are brought to you by offline Car Games or Car Racing Games no wifi Tap studios that open an exciting (4x4 mania or 4x4 off road games) 4x4 Off road SUV Jeep Driving Games where off road outlaws or off road jeep drivers will take SUV test drive ahead in Hill Jeep Driving Simulator and Monster Truck Games. Extreme car driving simulator game.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Car Simulator 3d & Car game 3d
description: In this school car parking simulator, you get to drive in the different car driving arenas skillfully with the various parking method and driving skills. Your love for 3d parking games will help you to play all levels and perform great driving in this offline parking game.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement. Press "Space" for handbrake.

title: Authentic Football
description: 3D modeling technology is employed to construct a lifelike football field, encompassing elements such as the green pitch, goalposts, and stands, thereby creating an immersive match atmosphere. The player and football models also boast a high level of intricacy. The players' movements are smooth and natural, and the flight path of the football adheres to the laws of physics, enabling players to feel as if they are in a real - life football match.
instructions: PC: press the W key for a long pass, press the S key for a short pass, press the D key for a shot, press the Q key to change players. Mobile: Joystick

title: Chess Duel
description: Master the art of chess with three exciting modes, each offering flexible time settings to suit every player. Take your chess skills to the next level, climb the ranks from Bronze to Diamond and strive to become a top chess player.
instructions: Choose between Bullet, Blitz or Classic mode to begin your match. Each mode features a distinct play duration and time increment per turn. Earn ELO points with each win to advance through the ranks and strengthen your tactical gameplay.

title: Archer Legend
description: Archer Legend – Test Your Archery Precision! Sharpen your aim and take down monsters with perfect shots! In Archer Legend, you need precise calculations to hit your targets and clear each level. Master your bow skills, adjust your angles, and strike with accuracy to become the ultimate archer!
instructions: ✔️ Aim your bow at the monsters ✔️ Calculate your shot for the perfect hit ✔️ Defeat all enemies to clear the level ✔️ Progress through challenging archery puzzles!

title: Battler
description: Immerse yourself in the world of tactical card battles, where your victory depends on the right choice and combinations of skills! You are fighting against decks of treacherous enemies. Choose one of three unique characters and immerse yourself in exciting battles. Use the character editor to fine-tune your character, adding unique abilities.
instructions: Put the skills one after the other and try to get an interesting combination. Super combinations are highlighted. In the character editor, choose which skills and "clothes" you need in battle. Upgrade by clicking the appropriate button and unlock new characters.

title: Leap and Avoid 2
description: Get ready for another thrilling journey with the white ball! "Leap and Avoid 2" brings new caves, lab levels, and fresh mechanics. Discover secret paths, collect coins, and unlock powerful bonuses like speed boosts and shields. Jump on white platforms, avoid black ones, and explore in all directions to find exits. The more coins you gather, the higher you rank. Compete with friends and uncover every hidden treasure!
instructions: Desktop controls: ─ Arrows (←) (→) left and right or "A" and "D" ─ ball movement; ─ "R" button ─ restart; ─ "ESC" button ─ toggle pause; ─ "LEFT MOUSE BUTTON" ─ control buttons in the menu. Mobile controls: ─ Tap the right and left half of the screen to move the ball; ─ Tap the buttons in the menu to press them.

title: The Drag Racing Challenge
description: Welcome to The Drag Racing Challenge game, an exciting new arcade racing game! Race through challenging missions, unlock and upgrade over 12 cars, and compete against opponents with customizable vehicles. Test your skills in realistic maps across five cities and enjoy smooth, high-quality racing. No fuel or time limits—just endless drag racing fun!
instructions: E: Gear Up Q: Gear Down Players can also use the mouse to click on the plus (+) icon in the game to shift gear up, and click on the minus (-) icon to shift gear down. W: Tap to begin driving Players can also use the mouse to click on the gas pedal icon in the game to accelerate. N: Nitrous

title: From Nerds to Beauties
description: Two girlfriends, the Little Mermaid and Arlene, embark on a world of stylish transformation. Their appearance, full of flaws, requires magical intervention. In the first stage of the game, the girls go through a series of fun cosmetic procedures that give them glowing skin and luxurious hair. At the second stage, you will have to become a stylist, choosing hairstyles, fashionable clothes and accessories. Each of your actions brings the heroines closer to their dream of becoming real beauties!
instructions: Help two girl friends to transform their appearance and choose a hairstyle, clothes and accessories. Each choice is an opportunity to be creative and create a unique style that will reflect the character of each of the heroines. The most successful images can be saved at the end of the game as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

title: Mahjong Tour
description: Mahjong Tour game is a cool mahjong game with colorful graphics, challenging levels and appealing themes. Match tiles of the same type and watch them flutter away. Once you clear the screen, the level is finished and you can move on to the next.
instructions: In Mahjong Tour game match two tiles of the same type to remove them. You win when the all the tiles are removed from the screen. If you get stuck, you have power ups that you can buy to help you continue playing. For each level you complete, you will earn extra coins. Try to save them up for the later stages of the game.

title: Bubble Shooter Billiards & Pool
description: Do you love Pool, Billiards, or Snooker? Now, imagine them combined with your favorite Bubble Shooter game! Bubble Shooter Billiard Pool brings a fresh twist to the classic bubble shooter by blending the thrill of billiards with strategic bubble-popping action. Line up your shots, swap bubbles for the perfect move, and aim for high scores in a vibrant pool hall setting. The crowd is watching—can you master your technique and become the ultimate champion? Play now and find out!
instructions: Aim and shoot bubbles to match three or more of the same color and clear them from the board. The arrow at the bottom shows where your shot will go. You'll see two bubbles: the one ready to shoot and the next one in the bottom left for strategic swaps. Successfully popping groups keeps the board clear, but missing shots adds new rows, pushing bubbles closer to the bottom. Don't let them drop too low, or it's game over!

title: Contract Deer Hunter
description: Step into the shoes of a skilled hunter in Contract Deer Hunter, an immersive 3D hunting game where precision and strategy are key. Accept challenging contracts to hunt wild animals in various environments, including dense forests and open plains. Your mission is to take down your targets with precision to earn cash rewards. The better your aim and the more vital the hit, the greater the payout!
instructions: Take on challenging contracts, hunt wild animals with precision, and prove your skills in this immersive 3D hunting game!

title: Color It in 3D
description: Meet the best 3D coloring book! Relax, immerse yourself in creativity and get inspired! Draw and create fantasy, cartoon, funny and anime action figures! If you like 3D character designs, drawing, coloring, then this coloring book is for you.
instructions: The goal of the game is to paint all 3D figures in colors. The figures are collected in your personal collections. Control - a long-tap on the object to start drawing, a swipe for coloring, buttons with a magnifying glass for zoom, arrow buttons for rotating a 3D object.

title: War Robots Battles
description: Enter the future battlefield, and lead your powerful robots in exciting battles. War Robots Battles lets you feel the most exciting robot action. You can attack with powerful weapons and use strategy to win. Choose your robot, equip powerful weapons, and build the strongest combat team. Choose from wind sword, imperial bow, etc.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Garden Guardians
description: Garden Guardians is a casual mobile game that merges strategic tower defense with physics-based ballistics. Players take on the role of a countryside guardian, ‌dragging and combining fruits with unique properties to build cannons‌, which they upgrade to fend off relentless dragon invasions. Will you let the farmland fall, or will you erect an unbreakable defense with fruit-powered artillery? The joy of the harvest hinges on your firepower!
instructions: Follow the tutorial prompts: ‌Click the mouse‌ to collect fruits, then ‌drag and combine them to create cannons‌. Place the cannons on the turrets to ‌initiate combat‌.

title: Soo Match: Room Design
description: Soo Match! is a fun and engaging blast game. Players progress by tapping and matching blocks of the same color to complete levels. At the end of each level, tickets can be used to complete rooms and unlock new stages, while in-game coins can be spent to acquire new characters. With its charming graphics and diverse game modes, Soo Match! offers a dynamic and enjoyable gaming experience.
instructions: Click on matching blocks of the same color to clear them. Create special matches to earn Bombs, Rockets, and Lightning power-ups. Complete the specified objectives to finish the level. Earn in-game coins to unlock characters and purchase puzzle pieces. Open chests, complete tasks, and claim daily rewards for extra boosts.

title: Beam Drive Car Crash Test Simulator
description: Experience thrilling car crashes with realistic physics and intense destruction! Smash, wreck, and demolish vehicles in crash tests, demolition derbies, and sandbox modes. Dive into authentic impact mechanics and explore the ultimate crash simulator for car destruction fans!
instructions: Driving/Walking/Flying - WASD Right mouse button - Rotate camera Space - Handbrake C - Change camera B - Look back H - Horn J - Hazard lights Z - Left turn signal X - Right turn signal For mobile devices, use the in-game interface.

title: Mathematics Racing
description: Welcome to Mathematics Racing, the thrilling game where your math skills determine your speed on the track! Dive into a world where solving math problems propels you to victory. Here's what you need to know.
instructions: Solve examples to accelerate, try not to make mistakes, otherwise your car will slow down. Solve 5 examples in a row without mistakes to activate turbo acceleration. With the money you win, you can buy new cars. Each car has its own acceleration and top speed characteristics. With new levels, more cars will be available to you. The difficulty of the examples is adjusted automatically, depending on the proportion of correct answers.

title: Steampunk Merge To Battle
description: Merge to Battle is a strategy game where the goal is to capture all the castles in your way. Unite your warriors and archers on the battlefield and fight against enemies. Build and upgrade your castle and troops. Explore the entire evolution of warriors by combining two units into an even stronger one. React quickly and use strategy and tactics to win the battle and advance to the next level.
instructions: Buy and merge units to conquer new castles!

title: Cross Connect Word
description: Fun and relaxing crossword puzzle! Cross Word Connect is a fun but challenging word game. Enjoy modern word game with the combine of word search and crossword! In this fantastic crossword puzzle, you will improve your vocabulary and spelling skills.
instructions: Use mouse/ touch & drag to connect Alphabet Letters to make correct word!

title: GT Micro Racers
description: GT Micro Racers takes high-speed racing to a whole new scale! Control tiny but powerful GT-style cars as they speed through thrilling outdoor tracks made from everyday household objects. Race across books, cans, and wooden ramps in a sunlit backyard filled with grass, flowers, and playful obstacles. Drift through sharp turns, hit insane jumps, and outmaneuver rivals to claim victory
instructions: arrow keys to move

title: Mojo Match 3D
description: Discover the ultimate Match 3D experience in Mojo Match 3D! Dive into a world where colors collide and puzzles await at every turn.
instructions: In this game, you need to find and select groups of three or more identical items so that they disappear without being replaced. Here's how it works: - Look closely at the playing field—there are many items scattered around. Find the ones that can form a combination. - Select the ones needed to form a group of three or more identical elements. - Check and Disappear: Once you select the right combination, the items will vanish. Give it a try, experiment, and enjoy the game!

title: Moto Attack Bike Racing
description: Moto Attack - Bike Racing is a fun bike racing simulator that takes speed and action to the next level. Drive your motorcycle and race against opponents. You can use weapons to attack them. Ride your bike through challenging tracks, and avoid obstacles like people crossing the street, cabs, boxes, etc.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Draw War
description: Unleash your creativity in Draw War. This is a wonderful strategy game. Here drawing meets battles. Build a hero lineup, draw your legions, then unleash the power of your army. The numbers show the soldiers summoned. Click to send Shielded Soldiers, Soldiers on Horseback, or Super Beasts.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Extreme Makeover Harley Edition
description: In the Extreme Makeover: Halrely Edition you witness the complete transformation of a famous villain. Are you ready to give it a try? Play it today and give her a full makeover routine, starting with removing the two signature colors in her hair, then dealing with her makeup, manicure, and more. Don't forget to also dress her up in something girly-girl and super-colorful so she can strut her stuff through the streets of Gotham City.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Bubble Mania Shooter
description: So easy to play, yet challenging to master - welcome to the wonderful bubble universe! Get ready for a game with colorful shooting action where the fun never ends! Sharpen your aim, perfect your shots, blast bubbles, and claim the highest score.
instructions: The goal of the game is to clear the balls with as few shots as possible to earn the maximum number of stars. To pass levels with ease, aim for accuracy and use special power-ups. Beware of unique, challenging bubbles that are tough to pop! Level up and get the highest score!

title: Bubble Rush
description: You are surrounded by colorful bubbles. You need to shoot bubbles in such a way as to form a group of three or more bubbles of the same color. When you use up all your available shots, a row of bubbles will approach you from above, below, or from the sides. When you completely clear one side, bubbles from that side will no longer appear
instructions: Shoot colored bubbles to completely clear the playing field.
